hudson
Interface ExtensionPoint

All Known Subinterfaces:
TopLevelItem
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBuild, AbstractProject, Ant, ArtifactArchiver, BatchFile, Build, Builder, BuildTrigger, BuildWrapper, ChangeLogAnnotator, CommandInterpreter, CVSSCM, ExternalJob, ExternalRun, Fingerprinter, ItemListener, JavadocArchiver, Job, JobListener, JobListener.JobListenerAdapter, JobProperty, JUnitResultArchiver, Mailer, Mailer.UserProperty, Maven, MavenArtifactArchiver, MavenBuild, MavenFingerprinter, MavenJavadocArchiver, MavenMailer, MavenModule, MavenModuleSet, MavenModuleSetBuild, MavenReporter, NullSCM, Project, Publisher, Run, SCM, SCMListener, SCMTrigger, Shell, SubversionSCM, SurefireArchiver, TimerTrigger, Trigger, UserProperty, ViewJob
public interface ExtensionPoint

Marker interface that designates extensible components in Hudson that can be implemented by Plugins.

Interfaces/classes that implement this interface can be extended by plugins. See respective interfaces/classes for more about how to register custom implementations to Hudson.

Author:
Kohsuke Kawaguchi
See Also:
Plugin
